last_episode_to_air.name: The Titan Games Championship
last_episode_to_air.overview: Six elite Titans from the Central, West and Eastern regions return for the final rounds of competition. The top two men and women will advance to compete on Mt. Olympus one final time, where one man and one woman will be crowned Titan Champions.

name: The Titan Games
overview: Dwayne Johnson redefines the athletic competition, giving exceptional men and women from all walks of life the chance to test their physical strength and mental fortitude for the chance to battle on Mount Olympus in hopes of becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: Let The Titan Games Begin: Trials 1
episodes.overview: In Dwayne Johnson's athletic competition, exceptional men and women from all walks of life battle head-to-head in tests of physical strength and mental fortitude in hopes of becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Trials 2
episodes.overview: Dwayne Johnson invites eight competitors to test themselves on the most insane physical challenges ever - including one that's 30 feet above the ground - in the hopes of becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Trials 3
episodes.overview: Dwayne Johnson invites eight competitors to test themselves on the most insane physical challenges ever - including one that's 30 feet above the ground - in the hopes of becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Trials 4
episodes.overview: Dwayne Johnson invites eight competitors to test themselves on the most insane physical challenges ever - including one that's 30 feet above the ground - in the hopes of becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Trials 5
episodes.overview: Competitors battle opponents in head-to-head challenges designed by Dwayne Johnson, continuing to push their bodies to the limit in hopes of advancing to Mount Olympus and becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Trials 6
episodes.overview: Competitors battle opponents in head-to-head challenges designed by Dwayne Johnson, continuing to push their bodies to the limit in hopes of advancing to Mount Olympus and becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Trials 7
episodes.overview: Dwayne Johnson invites eight competitors to test themselves on the most insane physical challenges ever - including one that's 30 feet above the ground - in the hopes of becoming a Titan.

episodes.name: The Battle of the Titans
episodes.overview: The field of 64 athletes has been narrowed down to 16 elite Titans, who compete head-to-head for the chance to advance to the final and compete in the ultimate test on Mount Olympus.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Championship
episodes.overview: The field of 64 athletes has been narrowed down to eight elite Titans, who compete on Mount Olympus to determine the one man and one woman who will become the ultimate Titans.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Premiere
episodes.overview: The Central division faces off in a best-of-three competition; the winning male and female competitor each battle a Pro-Athlete Titan on Mt. Olympus: NFL Iron Man legend and Pro-Bowler Joe Thomas and boxing world champion Claressa Shields.

episodes.name: Central Regionals 2: The Rock Meets Doc Thor
episodes.overview: The competition continues with the Central division battling in head-to-head challenges; the winning male will face reigning Titan and NFL great Joe Thomas, and the winning female will challenge reigning Titan Chantae McMillan on Mt. Olympus.

episodes.name: Central Regional Finals
episodes.overview: Top Central division competitors face off in three-way battles with the winners advancing to a head-to-head challenge; the last athletes standing must defeat reigning Titans Joe Thomas and Dani Speegle on Mt. Olympus to advance to the championship.

episodes.name: West Region Premiere: NFL's Victor Cruz and Stuntwoman Jessie Graff
episodes.overview: The Western region begins with four new competitors vying for their chance to compete on Mt. Olympus; the winning male and female each battle a Pro-Athlete Titan on Mt. Olympus: NFL great Victor Cruz and American Ninja Warrior star Jessie Graff.

episodes.name: West Region 2: The True Meaning of a Titan
episodes.overview: The competition continues with athletes pushing themselves to the limit by battling in head-to-head challenges; in the Western division battles, Exodus Rogers goes up against Mitch Harrison, while Kelly Stone takes on Margaux Alvarez.

episodes.name: West Region 3: The Circus Comes to Town
episodes.overview: The competition continues with registered nurse Robbie Rodriguez facing Cirque du Soleil performer Wayne Skivington while mountain guide Lindsey Hamm takes on bank teller Jamara Garrett for a chance to face the reigning Titans on Mt. Olympus.

episodes.name: Western Regional Finals
episodes.overview: NFL champ Victor Cruz and pro stuntwoman Jessie Graff return as top Western division athletes to face off in a three-way battle and a head-to-head challenge. The winners must defeat the reigning Titans on Mt. Olympus to advance to the championship.

episodes.name: East Region Premiere: UFC's Tyron Woodley and Gold Medalist Hannah Teter
episodes.overview: The Eastern Region begins with new competitors vying for their chance on Mt. Olympus, where the winning male and female will each battle a Pro-Athlete Titan: Olympic gold medal-winning snowboarder Hannah Teter and five-time UFC champ Tyron Woodley.

episodes.name: East Region 2: A Surprise for Dwayne
episodes.overview: The competition continues with athletes pushing themselves to the limit battling in head-to-head challenges. In the Eastern division battles, Michelle Lewis goes up against Dasha Kuret while Andrew Hanus takes on Ryan Steenberg.

episodes.name: East Region 3: DJ's Last Call
episodes.overview: The competition continues in the Eastern division with Josh Porter facing Blake Broadhurst while Shantal Athill takes on Courtney Roselle. Through head-to-head challenges, they vie for the chance to face the reigning Titans on Mt. Olympus.

episodes.name: Eastern Regional Finals
episodes.overview: Olympic snowboarder Hannah Teter and UFC champ Tyron Woodley return as top athletes from the Eastern division face off in a three-way battle and a head-to-head challenge. Winners must defeat the reigning Titans on Mt. Olympus to go to the championship.

episodes.name: The Titan Games Championship
episodes.overview: Six elite Titans from the Central, West and Eastern regions return for the final rounds of competition. The top two men and women will advance to compete on Mt. Olympus one final time, where one man and one woman will be crowned Titan Champions.
